items.question: What is Innovation Lab?
items.answer: Innovation Lab is a state-of-the-art facility designed to foster creativity, innovation, and technological advancement. We provide resources, equipment, and expertise to help turn ideas into reality.

items.question: Who can use the Innovation Lab?
items.answer: Our facilities are open to students, faculty members, researchers, and approved external partners. All users must complete a basic safety orientation before accessing the lab.

items.question: What equipment is available in the lab?
items.answer: We offer 3D printers, laser cutters, CNC machines, electronics workstations, VR/AR equipment, and various prototyping tools. A complete list is available in our resources section.

items.question: How do I book lab time?
items.answer: Lab time can be booked through our online portal. Users must book at least 24 hours in advance and specify which equipment they need.

items.question: What are the safety protocols?
items.answer: All users must attend safety training, wear appropriate PPE, and follow lab guidelines. Detailed safety protocols are provided during orientation.

items.question: Are there any usage fees?
items.answer: Basic lab access is free for enrolled students. Certain equipment and materials may incur additional costs. See our pricing page for details.
